meanings.definition: Analyze (something) again, typically in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She reanalyzed the data to find any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The scientist reanalyzed the experiment results for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: After the mix-up, she reanalyzed the recipe to get it right.
meanings.sent4: He reanalyzed his strategy, seeing it in a new light.
meanings.sent5: The detective reanalyzed the clues, hoping for a breakthrough.

meanings.definition: To examine or consider something again in order to make changes or corrections.
meanings.sent1: They reanalyzed the budget to make necessary adjustments.
meanings.sent2: The editor reanalyzed the article to improve its clarity.
meanings.sent3: The student reanalyzed the essay to fix errors.
meanings.sent4: She reanalyzed her painting, adding more details.
meanings.sent5: The coach reanalyzed the game plan, aiming for victory.
